      public Callback<StatPlayer> getPlayerStatsCallback(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer player)
      Parameters:
      player - offlineplayer instance of the player's stats you wish to retrieve.
      Returns:
      a callback which you can then add a completion listener to run code when the stat returns

      stats - Register stats for your plugin

    • unregisterStats

      public void unregisterStats(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin plugin)
      Parameters:
      plugin - Unregisters all the stats for your plugin saving them in the process. This is not necessary on shutdown of your plugin as it is done automatically.

    • unregisterStat

      Parameters:
      plugin - plugin that is registering the stat
      stats - Unregisters these stats for your plugin saving it in the process. This is not necessary on shutdown of your plugin as it is done automatically.
